name: Feign-tings
description:
Description

-"Feign-tings" is a short game about stamping artwork.

-My submission to the Brackeys 2022.1 game jam

Tutorial

-Each page of the reference book had a description of one of the paintings in the museum, however, the pages aren't in order, so you need to first determine which page correlates to the current painting, then use the information on that page to determine if the painting is real or not.

-Space for the reference book.

-Left-click the stamps to pick them up, then left-click again to stamp. Right-click to put down the stamp without stamping.

Credits

Playtesting

   -Sora MacDonald

   -Ren Clair

   -Mafo and Agnieszka Magoye

Art (in order of the game)

   -Mona Lisa, Leonardo da Vinci, 1502

   -The Blue Boat, Winslow Homer, 1892

   -Impression Sunrise, Claude Monet, 1872

   -Elegy to the Spanish Republic No. 70, Robert Motherwell, 1961

   -Pez Dispenser, Jean-Michel Basquiat, 1984

   -The Son of Man, Rene Magritte, 1964

   -Blue Poles, Jackson Pollock, 1952

   -Woman's Head, Pablo Picasso, 1934

   -PH-972, Clyfford Still, 1959

   -Composition A, Piet Mondrian, 1923

   -Squares With Concentric Circles, Wassily Kandinsky, 1913

Music
